span.span: Provides a for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法，可以將字串轉換為。The class provides methods that can convert a string to a . > [!NOTE] > 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。You should never access a type converter directly. 請改為使用中呼叫適當的轉換程式。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[How to： 實作類型轉換器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). 如需列印的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間的概觀。For more information on printing, see the namespace overview.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context`參數可以用來擷取的環境的這個轉換子所叫用的其他資訊。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

span.span: does not contain values for all four margins.

exception.span: 例如，「100,100,100,100」指定左、右、上方、下方邊界都是 1 英吋。

span.span: For example, "100,100,100,100" specifies 1 inch for the left, right, top, and bottom margins.
The conversion cannot be performed.
